title: Ticket #60: Add timing information to classad debug() function
description:
The classad debug() function allows for debugging of classad expressions. The debug information about evaluation should include timing data, either on each evaluation, each function call, and/or at least on the overall debug() function.

Current output... 

(submit file has: +expression = 1 + 1)

01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: expression --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: expression --> 2
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Machine --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Machine --> robin.local
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: regexp(".*a.*", Machine) --> 1
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Arch --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Arch --> INTEL
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: OpSys --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: OpSys --> LINUX
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Disk --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Disk --> 2001302
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: DiskUsage --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: DiskUsage --> 32
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Memory --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: Memory --> 1008
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: ImageSize --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: ImageSize --> 32
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: FileSystemDomain --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: TARGET.FileSystemDomain --> robin.local
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: FileSystemDomain --> ERROR
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: MY.FileSystemDomain --> robin.local
01/21 17:26:30 Classad debug: debug(expression == 2 && regexp(".*a.*", Machine) && (Arch == "INTEL") && (OpSys == "LINUX") && (Disk >= DiskUsage) && ((Memory * 1024) >= ImageSize) && (TARGET.FileSystemDomain == MY.FileSystemDomain)) --> 1
Maybe... 

Classad debug: [1 ms] expression --> 2
...
Classad debug: [5 ms] regexp(".*a.*", Machine) --> 1
...
Classad debug: [8 ms] debug(expression == 2 && regexp(".*a.*", Machine) && (Arch == "INTEL") && (OpSys == "LINUX") && (Disk >= DiskUsage) && ((Memory * 1024) >= ImageSize) && (TARGET.FileSystemDomain == MY.FileSystemDomain)) --> 1
remarks:
2010-Jul-01 11:06:13 by psilord:
This should go into master.

2010-Jul-06 14:52:47 by slauson:
The classad debug() function isn't implemented in the development series of Condor yet. Jaime is working on it.

2010-Jul-06 15:53:43 by psilord:
After speaking with Jamie, he's inclined to ignore implementing the classad debug() function until there is actual need for it. So, this ticket goes back to new and gets assigned to pits.

2010-Jul-06 17:14:16 by matt:
Eeek, debug() is present in 7.4. Do you intend to drop it in 7.5?

2010-Jul-06 17:28:31 by jfrey:
We'd like to implement it for 7.5, but it hasn't been a high priority yet.
2010-Oct-20 15:59:08 by jfrey:
Bulk change of target version from v070504 to v070505 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Jan-27 14:21:33 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 14:49:30 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.

2012-Oct-30 14:20:46 by jfrey:
Two comments on this change:

  • We should have Windows code.
  • The timing operations in Evaluate() should only be done if state.debug is true. [DONE]

2012-Nov-07 13:35:36 by jfrey:
You missed the second ExprTree::Evaluate() method when making the timing only happen when in debug().

2012-Nov-07 14:44:52 by matt:
Thanks. I searched for gettimeofday, they should all be covered now.
2012-Dec-11 16:35:11 by johnkn:
Bulk change of target version from v070902 to v070903 using ./ticket-target-mover.
